nodes.text: Quarren artisanal ink was a type of ink associated with the sentient Quarren species. It was used by members of the Hutt species in kajidic tattoos. The pirate queen Maz Kanata listed the artisanal ink as one of the smuggling cargoes that offered the most profit per kilogram in the book known as the Smuggler's Guide, which she wrote by 10 BBY.
Quarren artisanal ink was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
